previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. Montreal Impact | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 2, Montreal Impact 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution take on Montreal Impact at Gillette Stadium in a key Eastern Conference matchup.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs. Montreal Impact

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact).
First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Becca Orsini-Baldyga
timelineItems.text: Yeah it's raining. We don't care :) #NewEngland #revolution #revs #nerevs #nerevsselfie #allweatherfans @bbaldyga811

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Jack McInerney (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Andrés Romero.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Tonight's possibly the easiest game -- on paper -- left on the #NERevs schedule. A win increases Revs playoff chances to 93.4%. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Guillaume
timelineItems.text: Mallace fait des dummy? #nice #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 0, Montreal Impact 1. Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from the center of the box to the center of the net.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Calum Mallace slots it home

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: Suggestion to The Fort... Montreal's in town. Swear in French. Plus, it'll confuse the Hell out of Team Ops. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Probably should've put that cross away. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: Got 'em right where we want 'em. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Kyle McCarthy
timelineItems.text: #NERevs line completely tattered on the ball over the top to McInerney. Easy finish for Mallace. Work to do for New England. #mls

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Well. That was silly. Terrible defending. Farrell not fouled. Just terrible. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution).
Attempt missed. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Mamadou Danso.

timelineItems.name: Nathan Gower
timelineItems.text: If #NERevs stick to their game plan but shore up the defense, they'll be fine. All starts in Barnes' sloppy pass a minute ago.

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Premier but en carrière pour Mallace. Jack Mac a été très patient et généreux sur le jeu. #IMFC

timelineItems.desc: Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Andrew Farrell booked for poor challenge

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: 0-1 par Mallace, il semble y avoir faute, mais NE ne devait pas s'arrêter de jouer ! #NEvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Krzysztof Krol (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Et on voit le replay... Non non pas de faute #imfc #MTLvNE

timelineItems.name: Section 126
timelineItems.text: Congrats on your first #MLS goal @CMallace10! #IMFC #BleuBlancNoir

timelineItems.name: Jean-François Lepage
timelineItems.text: L'équipe B de #Imfc ne semble pas avoir de complexes! J'aime! #impacttvasports

timelineItems.name: Noah Markowicz
timelineItems.text: Farrell should already be out of this game. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Déjà un jaune à Farrell, ça va passer de son côté pour le reste du match. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Jose's distribution has been AWFUL this year. AWFUL. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: Klopas be like where @CMallace10 haters at ? #IMFC #NEvMTL #MLS http://t.co/FDruWv4JiN

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Mamadou Danso (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Sébastien Nolan
timelineItems.text: Ce sera une soirée difficile, mais une belle expérience pour les jeunes. On mise tout sur le match de mercredi contre New York #IMFC #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Jermaine Jones blasts free kick on net

timelineItems.name: Hugo Sham
timelineItems.text: Hey @KurtLarSUN check out what's happening in foxboro. #IMFC showed up with its 2015 USL Pro League team

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Wandrille Lefevre (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Nathan Gower
timelineItems.text: I thought #NERevs were doing phenomenally in the early goings. Need to rediscover that crisp ground-passing game.

timelineItems.comment: Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andrés Romero (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: GSharp
timelineItems.text: Excluding Perkins, what's #IMFC average age on the pitch tonight? #IMFClive #TSN690

timelineItems.name: Deep in the Fort
timelineItems.text: Can we sign someone who knows how to take a set piece? #NERevs

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: This is not your father's @impactmontreal of 3 weeks ago. #NEvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, New England Revolution 2, Montreal Impact 1.

timelineItems.name: Ginger Beard
timelineItems.text: 4 comeback wins in a row. #nerevs

timelineItems.name: Marcan Gagnon
timelineItems.text: Beau travail des jeunes de l'académie ce soir, l'avenir est intéressant. #imfc

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Five wins in a row. For a second time this season. REALLY want to see more from them with a man advantage. But I'll take it. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Stéphane Allard
timelineItems.text: Bel effort de l'équipe C de #IMFC. On se retrouve mercredi au Stade Saputo pour un match très important #CONCACAF #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.desc: The New England Revolution take on the Montreal Impact at Gillette Stadium in a key Eastern Conference matchup.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs. Montreal Impact | September 13, 2014

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Can't stop. Won't stop. Five Nguyen-s in a row for #NErevs. Highlights: http://t.co/eR0XGsJpMx #NEvMTL http://t.co/eYvmf0ozui

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: New England a le ballon mais ne sait pas quoi en faire contre une défense regroupée #NEvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Calum Mallace (Montreal Impact).
Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: RevGunner
timelineItems.text: We won't be winning this game and it is a disgrace. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 1, Montreal Impact 1. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Kelyn Rowe hits a rocket from distance

timelineItems.name: Christopher Brown
timelineItems.text: ROWELAZO!!!! #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Nathan Gower
timelineItems.text: First ten, #NERevs were dominant. Second ten #IMFC were dominant. Who sees out the first half?

timelineItems.name: Fake Slyde
timelineItems.text: Best playing surface in MLS right there. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  New England Revolution 2, Montreal Impact 1. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the center of the box to the top right.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Lee Nguyen calmly chips the ball into the back of the net

timelineItems.name: Noah Markowicz
timelineItems.text: No one's fault but Perkins on that one. Have to save that. #imfc

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @Krowe210 smashes in the equalizer. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Mauricio Vincello
timelineItems.text: Je crois malheureusement que Perkins vient de signer son arrêt de mort avec cette faute de main... Triste. #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Mike Amrock
timelineItems.text: As I was saying....NGUYENNING!! @LeeNguyen24 #NERevs 2-1

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: And there it is... 2-1 NE in a matter of minutes. All on the defense #IMFC

timelineItems.comment: Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jérémy Gagnon-Laparé (Montreal Impact).

timelineItems.name: Marcan Gagnon
timelineItems.text: L'#imfc ne perd pas ses mauvaises habitudes, l'avance est non seulment perdue mais donner .

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: That's the definition of composure right there from @LeeNguyen24. 2-1 to the Revs. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Julien Tessier
timelineItems.text: ok même quand tout semble bien aller, on trouve le moyens d'avoir l'air cave #IMFC

timelineItems.name: L'Alternative Foot
timelineItems.text: o_O il a vraiment dit que c'est un candidat au but de la semaine ?? #IMFC #NEvMTL #MLS

timelineItems.name: New England Revolution
timelineItems.text: Thank you to Air Force Tech Sergeant Patti Testa for all you do and for being tonight's #NERevs Honorary Captain!

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Craig Forde
timelineItems.text: Rowe and Nguyen scoring two minutes apart looks to be closest #NERevs goals this season. The two struck 3 minutes apart v Colorado on 7/30

timelineItems.name: BENJ…[ LOADING ]
timelineItems.text: Good teams force and capitalize on defensive mistakes. Never mind the defense: that sequence was fantastic. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Dilly Duka (Montreal Impact) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Andrés Romero with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: Elizabeth C.
timelineItems.text: The recap for every #IMFC match ever: 'We were winning. Then we blew our lead. Then we lost.'

timelineItems.name: The Rebellion
timelineItems.text: Just add water and The Fort gets LOUDER! #singingintherain #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Krzysztof Krol.

timelineItems.name: Abram the Anonymous
timelineItems.text: I don't dispute that Jones's worth every penny he's paid, but Nguyen is underpaid. What's his worth? I'd say about what Jones earns. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: TheRealHorseGuy
timelineItems.text: Enjoying myself at the #NERevsgame #NERevs #horseguywinningstreak http://t.co/9bdLrm9OML

timelineItems.text: Rowe’s goal was his third of the season, matching his rookie total in 2012. He scored seven last year. #NERevs

timelineItems.text: Doit-on penser que Zakaria Messoudi n'est plus dans les plans de #IMFC ? Seul académicien/pro à ne pas avoir de minutes en #MLS.

timelineItems.text: And we love our Rebels manning the capo stand! #NERevs http://t.co/nmZqmjYQ0L

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: La manie des noms composés au Québec est en train de ralentir toute une génération de footballeurs dans la province #imfc #NEvMTL #notreally

timelineItems.name: NE Soccer Journal
timelineItems.text: Tonight’s announced attendance (19,665) is the #NERevs second highest of the season, trailing only June 8 game vs. #RBNY (23,950).

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).
Louis Beland-Goyette (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - Three of Montreal’s nine #MLS goals against the Revolution have been via penalty kick by Patrice Bernier. Spotted. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Kendall Logsdon
timelineItems.text: A little rains not stopping us #NERevs #3pts

timelineItems.name: Matthias Van Halst
timelineItems.text: Contre-attaque, jeu au sol et axe du jeu : principales forces offensives des deux clubs en lice à #NEvMTL ; Qui saura en profiter ?

timelineItems.name: Dave Lévesque
timelineItems.text: Tsé quand y a moins de 10 000 personnes dans un stade qui peut en contenir 69 000... #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Danyelle Mottram
timelineItems.text: #NERevs @NERevolution #diehardfans http://t.co/BFhbbuRRqa

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - @impactmontreal have won four of six #MLS games against New England, including both at Gillette Stadium thus far. Warriors. #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #IMFC with only 6 players on the bench tonight. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Olivier Tremblay
timelineItems.text: 1st start for HGPs Jackson-Hamel & Gagnon-Laparé. 1st app. on teamsheet for HGP Béland-Goyette. 4 HGPs in the 18 (Lefèvre's the other).

timelineItems.name: Sofiane Benzaza
timelineItems.text: Bcp de contrats HGP signés, une équipe #USLPro en 2015 , et voilà la réponse à mon questionnement sur autant de contrats HGP #imfc #NEvMTL

timelineItems.name: Matty Jollie
timelineItems.text: Oh. My. God. Paul Mariner’s suit. @BFeld67 @NERevolution #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Richard Scott
timelineItems.text: So @yanxchick we need to see Jérémy Gagnon-Laparé & Anthony Jackson-Hamel in 2015 Topps MLS #morehomegrownplayers #bleublancnoir

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: View if the pregame festivities honoring the military and Boston first responders #NERevs @gillettestadium

timelineItems.comment: Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Eric Miller (Montreal Impact).
Foul by Jérémy Gagnon-Laparé (Montreal Impact).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Troy Perkins saves Lee Nguyen free kick in lower corner

timelineItems.name: Pascal Rainville
timelineItems.text: Même s'ils jouent a 10, j'aimerais voir #IMFC pousser vers l'avant . Ont protège un résultat déjà perdant de toute façon #ImpactTVASports

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: Cristina
timelineItems.text: Watching the #IMFC game with my pops - Half way through the 2nd half & he says "these guys should be shot for how bad they're playing" LOL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Louis Beland-Goyette.

timelineItems.name: Daniel Ruiz
timelineItems.text: Perkins didnt suddenly just become a bad GK. Another great save. More of an indictment of the backline play this year than the GKs #IMFC

timelineItems.name: Nathan Gower
timelineItems.text: I know we're only five minutes in, but #NERevs have 81% of the possession.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: BIG. MEATY. CLAWS. Huge save from Troy Perkins: http://t.co/ctgfiRFObX #NEvMTL

timelineItems.comment: Louis Beland-Goyette (Montreal Impact) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Corner,  Montreal Impact. Conceded by Lee Nguyen.
Second Half ends, New England Revolution 2, Montreal Impact 1.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
